resources.string: WARNING: Your examination of conscience will be lost by privacy issues, if you leave this screen!
Bless me father for I have sinned There is [time] I did my last confession. My sins are as follows ...

string-array.name: confissao_mandamentos
string-array.item: First Commandment: I am the Lord thy God, Thou shalt have no gods strangers before me (including sins against the Faith, Hope and Charity)
Second Commandment: Thou shalt not take the Name of the Lord thy God in will.
Third Commandment: Remember thou keep holy the Sabbath Day
Fourth Commandment: Honor thy father and thy mother.
Fifth Commandment: Thou shalt not kill.
Sixth and Ninth Commandments: Thou shalt not commit adultery. Thou shalt not covet neighbor\'s wife.
Seventh and Tenth Commandments: Thou shalt not steal. Do not covet the goods thy neighbor\'s.
Eighth Commandment: Thou shalt not bear false witness against your neighbor.

string-array.name: confissao_primeiroMandamento
string-array.item: neglected the knowledge of my faith, as the Catechism teaches, as the Apostles\' Creed, the Ten Commandments, the Seven Sacraments, the Our Father, etc.
Have I deliberately doubted any of the teachings of Church or denied
I took part in an act of Catholic worship is not
I am a member of some non-Catholic religious organization, the secret society or a group of anti-Catholic
ever read, with awareness of what she did, some literature heretical, blasphemous or anti-Catholic
I practiced any superstitions (such as horoscopes, fortune, Ouija board, etc.).
leave to recommend me daily to God
stop praying faithful to my daily prayers
I abused the sacraments in any way
mock God of Our Lady, the Saints, the Church, the Sacraments, or other holy things
I was guilty of great irreverence in church, for example, conversation, behavior, or how he was dressed
I was indifferent to my Catholic Faith - believing that a person can be saved in any religion or all religions are equal
assumed at any time had guaranteed the mercy of God
despair of the mercy of God
I hated God
I given too much importance to any creature, activity, object or opinion

string-array.name: confissao_segundoMandamento
string-array.item: I swear by God\'s name falsely, rashly or trivial and unimportant matters
I murmured or complained against God (blasphemy)
cursed me to myself, or another person or creature
Have I angered, to make them swear or blaspheme God
broke a promise to God

string-array.name: confissao_terceiroMandamento
string-array.item: I missed Mass on Sundays or Holy Days of
I arrived late for Mass on Sundays and Holy Days of obligation, or left early because of me
I made other people miss Mass on Sundays and Days Saints guard, or leave early or be late for Mass
been willfully distracted during Mass
I done or commanded unnecessary servile work on Sunday or Holy Days of Obligation
buy or sell anything without the need for Sunday and Saints guard

string-array.name: confissao_quartoMandamento
string-array.item: I disobeyed my parents, they lack respect, I neglected to assist them in their needs or build your will or I refused to do so
shown irreverence towards people in positions of authority
or insulted I maligned priests or others consecrated to God
I had less reverence for the elderly
I mistreated my wife or my children
I was disobedient to my husband, or lacks respect
I neglected their material needs of my children
not tried to baptize my children early
neglect the religious education of my children right
I allowed my children neglecting their religious duties
I stopped to watch the companies with whom my children walk
to discipline them when I left my children need such
Gave bad example to my children
scandalized my children, arguing with my spouse in front their
scandalized my saying obscenities in front
I left to keep modesty in my house
Let my children to wear immodest clothing
I denied my children the freedom to marry or follow a religious vocation

string-array.name: confissao_quintoMandamento
string-array.item: procured, desired, or hastened the death or injury of someone
fed hatred for someone
oppressed anyone
wished to avenge me
caused enmity between others
quarreled or fought with someone
wished evil to someone
wanted to injure or mistreat someone, or tried to do it
I refuse to talk to someone, or someone of resentment
I rejoiced schadenfreude
I been jealous or envious of someone
I tried or an abortion, counseled or anyone else to do
mutilated my body unnecessarily in any way
consented to thoughts of suicide, I wanted to kill myself or attempted suicide
me become drunk or used illegal drugs
I ate too much, or not as careless enough
I failed to correct within the rules of charity
I harmed anyone\'s soul, especially children, giving scandal through bad example
I hurt my soul, exposing them intentionally and without need to temptations, and bad TV shows, music reprehensible, beaches, etc..

string-array.name: confissao_sextoEnonoMandamento
string-array.item: I denied my spouse his or her marriage rights
practiced birth control (pills, devices, interruption)
I abused my marriage rights in any other way
committed adultery or fornication (premarital sex)
I made any unnatural sin against nature (homosexuality or lesbianism, etc.).
impurely I have sinned against myself (masturbation)
consented to impure thoughts, or had pleasure in them
consented to impure desires to someone, or wanted consciously see or do anything impure
consciously gave me sexual pleasure, complete or incomplete
I was an occasion of sin for others by wearing tight, revealing or immodest
I deliberately or through carelessness, which provoke impure thoughts or desires another person
I read indecent literature or looked at bad pictures
Saw films or television programs suggestive, or pornographic Internet, or permitted my children to do so
I used indecent language or told indecent stories
I heard stories indecent goodwill
bragged to me of my sins, or delight in remembering sins old
been in lewd company
consented to impure glances
I neglected to control my imagination
ceased to pray at once to banish evil thoughts and temptations
I avoided sloth, gluttony, idleness, and occasions for impurity
I went to dances immodest or indecent plays

string-array.name: confissao_setimoEdecimoMandamento
string-array.item: I stole something? What, or how much
I damaged anyone\'s property
let it ruin by neglect, the property of others
I was negligent in the stewardship of money or property of others
I cheating or defrauded others
I played too much
I refused to pay any debt or neglected me in your payment
acquired anything known to be stolen
I failed to return something borrowed
Theft my boss, not working as expected of me
I cheated the wages of my employees
I refused to help anyone in urgent need of help, or neglected to do so I
I failed to return what they stole, or obtained by or embusted fraud (ask the priest how to make restitution, or that is, returning to the owner what it took)
I envy someone for having something that I have not
I envied the goods of one
Have I been stingy
I have given too much importance on material goods and comforts

string-array.name: confissao_oitavoMandamento
string-array.item: I lied about anyone (calumny)
My lies caused them damage or spiritual
I rashly judged anyone (that is, firmly believed, without sufficient evidence, they were guilty of some moral defect or crime)
injured the good name of someone revealing faults but true hidden (slander)
reveal the sins of someone else
I was guilty of doing intrigues (ie, to say something unfavorable that someone said someone else, to create enmity between them)
Gave credit or supporting the dissemination of scandal about mynext
I swore signed false documents or false
I am critical or negative unnecessarily or miss to charity in my conversations
